tp.pr5.items

Class CodeCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • tp.pr5.items.Item
      • tp.pr5.items.PlaceableItem
        • tp.pr5.items.CodeCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Item>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MockCodeCard

    public class CodeCard
extends PlaceableItem
    A CodeCard can open or close the door placed in the streets. The card contains a code that must match the street code in order to perform the action.
    Author:
    Abel Serrano Juste

    • Method Detail

      • canBeUsed

        public boolean canBeUsed()
        A code card always can be used. Since the robot has the code card it never loses it
        Overrides:
        canBeUsed in class PlaceableItem
        Returns:
        true because it always can be used

      • use

        public boolean use(RobotEngine r,
          NavigationModule nm)
        The method to use a code card. If the robot is in a place which contains a street in the direction he is looking at, then the street is opened or closed if the street code and the card code match.
        Overrides:
        use in class PlaceableItem
        Parameters:
        r - The robot engine employed to use the card.
        nm - The navigation module for knowing where WALL·E uses the item.
        Returns:
        true if the code card can complete the action of opening or closing a street. Otherwise it returns false.

      • revert

        public boolean revert(RobotEngine r,
             NavigationModule nm)
        It closed the street it this card opened it and viceversa.
        Overrides:
        revert in class Item
        Parameters:
        r - The robot engine employed to use the card.
        nm - The navigation module for knowing where WALL·E used the item.
        Returns:
        code>true if the code card can complete the action of undo opening or closing a street. Otherwise it returns false.
